get.description: Lists all clusters in a subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription. The value must be an UUID.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

administratorLogin.description: The administrator's login name of the servers in the cluster.

administratorLoginPassword.description: The password of the administrator login. Required for creation.

state.description: A state of a cluster/server that is visible to user.

postgresqlVersion.description: The major PostgreSQL version on all cluster servers.

citusVersion.description: The Citus extension version on all cluster servers.

customWindow.description: Indicates whether custom maintenance window is enabled or not.

startHour.description: Start hour within preferred day of the week for maintenance window.

startMinute.description: Start minute within the start hour for maintenance window.

dayOfWeek.description: Preferred day of the week for maintenance window.

preferredPrimaryZone.description: Preferred primary availability zone (AZ) for all cluster servers.

enableShardsOnCoordinator.description: If distributed tables are placed on coordinator or not. Should be set to 'true' on single node clusters. Requires shard rebalancing after value is changed.

enableHa.description: If high availability (HA) is enabled or not for the cluster.

coordinatorServerEdition.description: The edition of a coordinator server (default: GeneralPurpose). Required for creation.

coordinatorStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of a server in MB. Required for creation. See https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/postgresql/resources-compute for more information.

coordinatorVCores.description: The vCores count of a server (max: 96). Required for creation. See https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/postgresql/resources-compute for more information.

coordinatorEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public access is enabled on coordinator.

nodeServerEdition.description: The edition of a node server (default: MemoryOptimized).

nodeCount.description: Worker node count of the cluster. When node count is 0, it represents a single node configuration with the ability to create distributed tables on that node. 2 or more worker nodes represent multi-node configuration. Node count value cannot be 1. Required for creation.

nodeStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage in MB on each worker node. See https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/postgresql/resources-compute for more information.

nodeVCores.description: The compute in vCores on each worker node (max: 104). See https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/postgresql/resources-compute for more information.

nodeEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public access is enabled on worker nodes.

serverNames.description: The list of server names in the cluster

items.description: The name object for a server.

fullyQualifiedDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of a server.

sourceResourceId.description: The resource id of source cluster for read replica clusters.

sourceLocation.description: The Azure region of source cluster for read replica clusters.

pointInTimeUTC.description: Date and time in UTC (ISO8601 format) for cluster restore.

readReplicas.description: The array of read replica clusters.

earliestRestoreTime.description: The earliest restore point time (ISO8601 format) for the cluster.

privateEndpointConnections.description: The private endpoint connections for a cluster.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

properties.description: Properties of the private endpoint connection.

privateEndpoint.description: Private endpoint which the connection belongs to.

id.description: Resource id of the private endpoint.

groupIds.description: Group ids of the private endpoint connection.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

status.description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

description.description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

actionsRequired.description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of cluster list.

actionsRequired.description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

groupId.description: The private link resource group id.

requiredMembers.description: The private link resource required member names.

requiredZoneNames.description: The private link resource private link DNS zone name.

PrivateLinkResourceListResult.description: A list of private link resources.

ConfigurationNameParameter.name: configurationName
ConfigurationNameParameter.description: The name of the cluster configuration.

FirewallRuleNameParameter.name: firewallRuleName
FirewallRuleNameParameter.description: The name of the cluster firewall rule.

RoleNameParameter.name: roleName
RoleNameParameter.description: The name of the cluster role.

PrivateEndpointConnectionNameParameter.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
PrivateEndpointConnectionNameParameter.description: The name of the private endpoint connection associated with the cluster.

PrivateLinkResourceName.name: privateLinkResourceName
PrivateLinkResourceName.description: The name of the private link resource.
